website_summaries.verdict: In the area of comfort, the Salewa Wildfire Edge approach shoe does not disappoint. It is also a shoe that excels in the durability and fit categories.That said, its rather stellar resume is marred by criticisms, the most worrying of which has to be its uninspiring grip performance on damp surfaces. Nonetheless, the Wildfire Edge is an impeccable Salewa piece in which adventurers can hike, climb, and look well all at the same time.
pros: The Salewa Wildfire Edge (men’s and women’s) is remarkably comfortable, says almost everyone who has reviewed it
Based on numerous reports, this approach shoe from Salewa runs true to size
Several owners who have bought the Wildfire Edge say that it has lasting durability
The Wildfire Edge requires very minimal break-in time, according to some of those who have tested it thoroughly
A few patrons deeply adore the fantastic versatility of this incredible approach shoe
Its overall design is nothing short of captivating, a couple of purchasers say
An expert finds the supportiveness of this shoe quite impressive
cons: Professional reviewers find the Wildfire Edge’s outsole not very sticky on wet slabs
It is a rather bulky shoe, says a critic who has climbed in it a number of times
The shoe has a too-vibrant color scheme for minimalists to love, according to a gear expert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Day-Hiker
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable out-of-the-box. Great support and grip. Effective on descent and ascent, and firm or loose surfaces. My go-to shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: FITS TRUE TO SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: I JUST GOT THEM AND CAN'T WAIT TO WALK AND JOG IN MY TRACK SNEAKERS!
customer_reviews.author: EASY DOES IT

customer_reviews.title: Best pair I’ve had in years.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great shoe. I will be ordering more salewa without question.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Not and not as good looking as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: high quality shoes, but not crazy about the looks of these, kind of like a clog...also they are a little too warm for anything other than cool days. I had a previous pair of Salewa that were lightweight and better looking and cooler.
customer_reviews.author: NWGale

customer_reviews.title: Best flipping shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I go through shoes and have way too many. These are by far the best, most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. I love them. Hiking, biking or just walking around town. Gonna get another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Love them- issue with laces
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great and are very comfortable. I actually love them, the only issue I had is they are tearing away at the eyelids at the bottom of the shoelaces. This started at about a month after I had them.
customer_reviews.author: ryan brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality products
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit. Very well made. I have had nothing but good service from this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Pete B.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They look pretty cool but the comfort even for walks on the road is not that great
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Stockhausen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and keeps me sure footed in any terrain.
customer_reviews.text: Walk/hike a lot. These have kept me comfortable doing 12-20 mile walks around Chicago this summer. My 3rd pair...with 3 more in my closet (blue eyes, wear a lot of blue so I like 'em)
customer_reviews.author: MJFOSH

customer_reviews.title: Caused blisters
customer_reviews.text: Blisters after 10 hikes. Very unforgiving and stiff. Going into trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Cruz

product_meta.title: Salewa Wildfire Edge Walking Shoes - SS20
product_meta.description: Salewa Wildfire Edge Walking Shoes Designed to keep you in firm control on the mountainside, the Salewa Wildfire Edge Walking Shoes will provide a technical approach to provide a premium and outstanding performance. Switchfit System Upper Using Salewa's developed Switchfit System, the shoe can be easily adjusted to match the terrain that you are on, making the shoe the perfect adaptive walking shoe. As you begin to climb, a precise fit is required for complete control and to enhance the performance. Once you have finished ascending, the laces can be loosened at the rear eyelet. This will mean that the toebox will become roomier, making it perfect for hiking in supreme comfort. On the side of the shoe, there is an Exa Shell, which will enhance torsional stability. This will wrap around the midfoot, providing it with greater flexibility, fit and support. Air is able to flow in and out of the shoes, which will improve breathability with a constant airflow for ventilation. The material covering the toes and heel is extremely thick, which will provide protection from shocks and bumps as well as holding your feet in a firm, upright and healthy position. Climbing Lacing extends from the toes all the way up the foot for a precise and easily adjustable fit. A flat lying tongue and padded collar will improve the comfort, whilst also reducing the risk of irritation by rubbing and chafing. MFF+ Midsole The midsole is developed with the innovative multi-layer MFF+ which allows for more customisation on the forefoot by using two interchangeable layers to accommodate a greater range of foot shapes and sizes. The trademark of SALEWA 3F System connects the instep area of the shoe with the sole and heel; ensuring flexibility, support and the correct fit where it's needed. Beneficial microbes, which are found all around us and are naturally occurring, are selected and bonded to the surface of the fabric. This innovative process of applying live micro-organisms to fibres r
feature_bullets: Switchfit System - Adaptive laces allow you to change them depending on terrain.
Precise Fit - Enhances performance on climbing.
Loosened Toebox - The toebox can be loosened for more comfort on flat terrain.
Exa Shell - Enhanced torsional stability around the midfoot.
Firm Protection - Thick material surrounds the foot for protection.
